title: SMUA x SST (PC-ITP) Pre-Trip Workshop
description: Participated in various workshops by Lectures, covering topics ranging from China's Social Etiquette in Business to an overview of China's History.
highlights: Overview of China’s history, culture, and key philosophies.
Comparison of Chinese and Western etiquette in social and business contexts.
Exploration of business culture, 关系, and wine culture in China

title: Selected for IDP (Integrated Diploma Programme)
description: Accepted into SST-NP's Integrated Diploma Programme - a direct pathway from secondary school to Ngee Ann Polytechnic without O-Levels.
highlights: One of ~50 students selected per cohort
Direct entry to NP STEM diploma courses
Focus on applied learning and industry projects

title: Started Learning Backend Development (boot.dev)
description: Enrolled in comprehensive backend engineering track covering Typescript, system design, and distributed systems.

title: Engineering+ Program at SST
description: Pursuing both Computing+ and Electronics as Applied Subjects - a unique dual-track program at School of Science and Technology.
